reviewText: Yes, this flick that supposedly about otaku in reality propaganda nonsense for kids younger than 5 so, I guess, the producer hoped I will give it 5 instead of one. Sure, cell phones present and even computer mentioned sometimes but the point is the producer lives in 1200 B.C.E yes 1200 years before computer era. I am not sure whats word dating means in Japanese but the producer never dated anybody in his/her life as it clear from movie. Avoid.
I had low expectations for this movie, but when I watched it, I thought the plot was pretty decent. The beginning of the movie had made me thought this was a sequel to a previous movie.
I'll be honest when I got this I was thinking it would be a really boring comedy. But I would have to say for any yaoi fan girl this is relatable, funny and romantic!
